name: Onellet
description:
One bullet, one health point, one level to clear. Use your bouncing disc to kill all enemies in the labyrinth.
This small game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2019 with the theme 'Only one'. Enjoy it, and let me know your thoughts.

Controls

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK at the right time to grab the ball.
